column2: Are you located in Israel at the moment?
column5: Which of the following describe best your company's industry?
column7: How many employees does your company has?
column11: How many years do you work in your current company?

column16: Which department are you part of:

column23: Additional workplace benefits not included in base salary
column24: Do you feel your salary reflects your experience and role?
column25: Do you feel the Product Marketing role is well understood and clearly defined across your organization?
column26: Anything else you would like to add?
column27: Which if the following AI tools you use in a daily/weekly basis?
column28: Which topics would you like to become better at (using AI tools)?
column29: Do you use AI for automation?
column31:
Thank your your honesty and great collaboration!
Anything else you would like to add?

column31:
When it comes to content creation—not just refining—I don’t believe AI tools live up to the hype. At the end of the day, they can’t match the value a sharp PMM brings to the table.

It’s important not to waste time and resources on tools that don’t move the needle, especially when that energy could be better spent on what truly matters.
